Comes a man? It is! The Freeman!

The classic sequel to the popular original Half-Life.  Many of the things we loved about the original are back, with new puzzles and many hours of gameplay.  The game may be old now and graphically inferior to modern games, but the storyline and the gameplay make it worth the money.
A very well made game. Challenging with a great story. Not much here that anyone who love FPS's wouldn't like.

Mind orgasm.
The End was soooo epic. 
The Citadel was mind blowing.
Классика , пойдёт везде где только можно .

关播了兄弟们，不能太晚了，因为咱这里面有上学的，还有上班的，你们好好的，考个好成绩。还是那句话，给自己的父母争点光，别跟我学，往那一蹲，没出息，真事，让人唠一辈子。说句实话，我现在都成为笑话了，我得让人讲究一辈子。我跟你说背在我身上这个名，永远都擦不去了。不像我抹完口红，我拿纸还能擦掉，就是在我蹲茅坑起来的那一刻到现在，不是说到现在，到以后我都会一直背着，就是说我是一个吃屎的人。我自己心里明白我是啥样的人，但是我不在乎。有你们，为了你们，想想你们我也开心。谢谢你们，啥也不唠了，有你们我真的很开心。
had this game on my other account but that got hacked :( its a great game and a classic.

Half-Life 2 is a really good game! It makes me have to think about every move I take, if it's a puzzle or in a combat fight. I never really tried any combat that Half-Life 2 has like in forever and I just really like it. This game does have some bad things. Some stuff in the game is really hard to find, this includes stuff to move forward in the game. Once I complete a hard puzzle, I feel like my third eye just opened a bit more. Overall it's a really good game and you should try it if you haven't already!

Fun game. Great story. Not demanding at all considering it was made in 2004.
9.5/10 would play again
You are not a real first shootier gamer until you play HL.
等待半条命3 最终章。蓝胖快出呀
Like a fine wine, gets better with age.

quite possibly one of the best singleplayer FPS games of all time. This game's story telling and style really stands out from other FPS games, and is even better than a lot of current FPS stories. The graphics have aged surprisingly well too. Although there are now games that have a lot better graphics, this game (especially for releasing in 2004) had some amazing graphics and visuals.

Recomendadísimo, muy jugable y entretenido!

Excelente juego!

Muy buen juego, y en general gran franquicia. Half-Life 2, es alucinante como pasan los años y como le seguimos dando horas a estas historias (bizarras) tan entretenidas. Poco más que decir.

Si no lo has jugado nunca, píllalo con alguna oferta, no te decepcionará.
Oyun başyapıt. Hikayesi, oynanışı ile tam bir başyapıt.

How is it that in 2020 this game is still heads and shoulders above most games that come out today?! 
This is still a great game after all this time!
No map indicators holding your hand, no constant cut scenes disturbing gameplay. A fair challenge.
Even the AI is better here than games released recently.
A must buy.
gordon freeman! and about time too!

A classic game that still holds up today with fun gunplay and cool environments. If only there was more epidoes to finally complete this cool story!

Świetny model strzelania sprawia że jest to po prostu satysfakcjonujące.
Polecam tą grę kupić nawet za pełną cenę a jeżeli jest na przecenie to nawet się nie zastanawiaj tylko od razu bierz.

Play this game! Great mood and atmosphere and story and characters all the way through! 5/5 - a true classic.

Valla ne yazayım yılların oyunu yılların gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyunu. Zaman geçirmek için oynanan oyun.
Hanımla kavga edince açtığım oyun.
Çocukları bir yere gönderdiğimde açtığım oyun.
Canım sıkılıp hunharca hile yaptığım oyun.
İlk oyun sevdam.
Her ruh halimle oynadığım gerçek oyun. 
Bir çok oyuna sahibim ama bağımlısı olduğum hiç bir zaman aklımdan çıkmayacak olan tek oyun.
Oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum. Her bölümünü her serisini.
